text: Josef Čapek (English: Joseph Chapek; April 1945) was a Bohemian painter and writer, who was the brother of Karel Čapek, an writer. He also co-wrote a prose novel written by his brother Karel called, The Luminous Depths (Zářivé hlubiny in Bohemian). Category:1887 births Category:1945 deaths Category:Czech painters Category:Czech writers
title: Josef Čapek
